speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Go your ways, and ask of Doctor Caius’

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: house which is the way. And there dwells one Mistress

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Quickly, which is in the manner of his nurse,

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: or his dry nurse, or his cook, or his laundry—his

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Nay, it is petter yet. Give her this letter

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text:
(
                handing
                 
                him
                 
                a
                 
                paper
                )
              , for it is a ’oman that altogether’s

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: and the letter is to desire and require her to solicit

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: your master’s desires to Mistress Anne Page. I pray

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: you, be gone. I will make an end of my dinner;

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: there’s pippins and cheese to come.
